events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our hiring team.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
We conducted your initial screening interview and were impressed with your qualifications and experience.
Thank you for promptly responding to our interview invitation; we appreciate your enthusiasm for this role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with our lead developer.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
We have scheduled your HR interview on May 13th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and our team is excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering department.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the software engineer position with a competitive salary package.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer; we are eager to have you onboard and start this journey.
You have accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun. We look forward to supporting you as you start your new role.
The hiring process is now complete. Congratulations on joining our engineering team, and best wishes for your success.
